mapper.sql: id as id , userId as userId , agencyId as agencyId , create_dt as createDt , update_dt as updateDt , create_by as createBy , update_by as updateBy
mapper.select: SELECT account.* from power_user_account account INNER JOIN power_user puser ON puser.id = account.userId INNER JOIN power_platform_info platform ON platform.agencyId = account.agencyId INNER JOIN power_user_platform userplatform ON userplatform.platformId = platform.id AND account.userId=userplatform.userId WHERE userplatform.openId = #{openId} AND platform.uniqueKey = #{uniqueKey}
